thorwin.math

Class Affine2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • thorwin.math.Affine2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Matrix

    public final class Affine2D
extends java.lang.Object
    Affine matrix for transforming Vector2D instances.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • columnData

        public Vector2D columnData(int column)
        Returns the significant entries for the specified column as a 2D vector. The last row of the matrix is excluded as it is constant in the affine matrix.
        Parameters:
        column - column index
        Returns:
        The specified column as a 2D vector
